title:
Null controllability of an ODE-heat system with coupled boundary and
  internal terms
authors: Idriss Boutaayamou, Fouad Et-tahri, Lahcen Maniar
abstract:
This paper is devoted to the theoretical and numerical analysis of the null
controllability of a coupled ODE-heat system internally and at the boundary
with Neumann boundary control. First, we establish the null controllability of
the ODE-heat with distributed control using Carleman estimates. Then, we
conclude by the strategy of space domain extension. Finally, we illustrate the
analysis with some numerical experiments.
